group_1.narration: The story turned out to be pretty simple @once Ren and her friend explained it to me.

Ren and Aimi bumped into each other @while they were out shopping. @While they were chatting, a guy and a girl passed by. @The guy was the one Aimi was crushing on, @but she didn't recognize the girl with him.
Aimi panicked because she thought they were @both in a relationship and tried following them around. @Ren was concerned about leaving her alone, @so she went after her.
In the end, @once Aimi talked with the guy face-to-face @and found out the girl was actually his cousin, @she was super relieved, @and ran over to the park to cry it out...

group_1.textRight: Well... @That’s a huge relief.
I was worried that you were in danger or @something like that!
Yeah.
Cause it looked like you were running for your life...
I was so worried that something bad had happened @to you.
You didn’t bother me in any way! I just really @wanted to know what happened.
Mm-hmm.
Anyway, how’d your shopping go?
I’ll join you if you haven’t finished already.

group_1.textLeft: I-I-I... I was able to get... everything...

group_1.textRight: Really?
...Oh, what’s that for?

group_1.textLeft: Ah... I mean... they're the same, but...

group_1.textRight: Hm...? [wait:1.0][chara:303101:lipSynch_1]Ren...?
(Oh no... I forgot...)
(It's only two days until Christmas...)
(Duh! What else would she be buying today?!)
Ohhh... well, it's a good thing you've finished @shopping!
Anyway, are you feeling better, Aimi?
It's starting to get cold. @Why don't we head home?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, Ren... for making you come after me...

group_1.textRight: It’s... it’s okay...
I'm glad... you resolved... that misunderstanding... @Yes.
A-Achoo!
Ah, yeah, I’m definitely okay!
I’m just a little chilly, probably because I've been @running around and sweating all day!
I'll be a-okay once I get home and have a nice @hot bath!
C’mon, we’re gonna hang out tomorrow, @so why don’t we call it a day?

group_1.textCenter: Thank goodness... I was so worried that something @bad had happened to Ren.
